cities.newsHdng: Ranchi Violence: Explanation Sought From Top Cop Over Posters Of Accused
cities.newsCont: A day after Jharkhand police put up posters carrying photographs of those allegedly involved in the recent violent protests in Ranchi, the state's Home Secretary Rajiv Arun Ekka sought an explanation from the SSP over the  "unlawful" act.

cities.newsHdng: Delhi's Peak Power Demand Hits Record High For June
cities.newsCont: The peak power demand in the national capital rose to 7,334 MW on Wednesday afternoon, the highest ever in June, amid increased use of cooling appliances to beat the intense heat, discom officials said.

cities.newsHdng: Government Doctor Dies After Falling From His 11th Floor Bengaluru Flat
cities.newsCont: A 32-year-old doctor from Kadapa in Andhra Pradesh, who was working at the Victoria Government Hospital in Bengaluru, died after falling from his 11th floor apartment at Amruthahalli in the city on Wednesday, police said.

cities.newsHdng: Cop Injured In Grenade Attack In Jammu and Kashmir's Anantnag
cities.newsCont: A police personnel was injured in a grenade attack in Anantnag district of Jammu and Kashmir on Wednesday, police said.

cities.newsHdng: Woman Cop In Bihar Pulled Out Of Moving Train In Mobile Snatching Attempt
cities.newsCont: A woman police constable was critically injured on Wednesday, after she was pulled out from a moving train by a group of criminals in an attempt to snatch her mobile phone near Katihar railway station in Bihar, police said.

cities.newsHdng: Watch: Water Tanker Rams Into Shoppers In Delhi Market
cities.newsCont: Five people were injured after being run over by a speeding water tanker in a busy market in southeast Delhi's Badarpur area, police said on Wednesday.

cities.newsHdng: Rahul Gandhi Supporters Protest Atop Water Tank In Delhi On Day 3 Of ED Questioning
cities.newsCont: The two men raised slogans of "Rahul Gandhi, Zindabad (Live And Prosper)" and claimed to be activists of the Congress wing, National Students' Union of India (NSUI).

cities.newsHdng: To Get Preference In Assam Police Recruitment: Chief Minister
cities.newsCont: Youths who serve for four years in the armed forces under the 'Agnipath' scheme announced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be given preference during recruitment to Assam police, Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma said on Wednesday,

cities.newsHdng: Heatwave Back In Delhi As Rain Gives It A Miss
cities.newsCont: Heatwave returned to parts of the capital despite the weather department predicting cloudy sky and light rain on Wednesday.

cities.newsHdng: 72-Year-Old Man Arrested Over Protest Outside Delhi's Jama Masjid
cities.newsCont: A 72-year-old man has been arrested for allegedly disrupting communal harmony and holding a protest without permission at the Jama Masjid area in Delhi recently against the controversial remarks of now-removed BJP functionaries on Prophet Mohammad.

cities.newsHdng: 2 Arrested Over Extortion Call With Sidhu Moose Wala Reference In Delhi
cities.newsCont: The Intelligence Fusion and Strategic Operations (IFSO) unit of Delhi Police on Wednesday arrested two persons for allegedly making extortion calls to a Ludhiana-based businessman in the name of Lawrence Bishnoi--Goldy Brar gang.

cities.newsHdng: Delhi Registers More Than 1,100 Covid Cases For Second Consecutive Day

cities.newsHdng: Explosives Recovered From Bus In Jammu
cities.newsCont: Jammu and Kashmir Police recovered explosives in the form of gelatin sticks from a bus carrying an unidentified number of passengers on the outskirts of the city on Wednesday, officials said.
